sys_ui_message.message:
ABSA has taken a strong stance against the spreading of COVID-19.
Our COVID-19 policies and procedures are as follows: 1. Clients should be informed that if they have any COVID-19/flu-like symptoms, they should please advise our consultants and reschedule their appointment 2. Facial masks must be worn 3. All clients' temperatures must be recorded and they will be required to complete the COVID-19 screening questionnaire 4. Hands must be sanitised on entry, during and after signature of documentation and during and after the consultation 5. Strict social distancing measures must be adhered to 6. All regulations published by the COVID-19 Command Centre must be strictly complied with at all times
